resources.string:
Welcome to Unofficial Sticky Notes! 
This app converts the Sticky Notes website version to work on Android Lollipop (5.0) and up. 

Added Features: 

• Toggle between light, dark, and system themes via the volume keys. Additionally, they can be used to reload the page. 

• Works offline, but you must sign into it at least once, for the sticky notes to show up on your device. 

• You can now pull-to-refresh the app. 

Current Bugs: 

• Normal text input mode causes text to not input correctly, so temporarily soft keyboards will have glide/voice typing turned off. (yes that includes GBoard) 

• Android 10 devices currently can't use camera to upload pictures directly in app (Google's fault). 

Planned Features: 

• App menu/info button 

• Undo/redo buttons for when editing notes (might be too much of a hassle to implement). 

• Widgets for single notes (do know that these won't be able to sync automatically, due to how I this app is setup). 

This app is open-sourced, so if you know how to code and want to help out, check out my GitHub. 

If you want Microsoft to create a true standalone version of Sticky Notes as a separate app, please head to the petition I created to make Sticky Notes a standalone app, and sign it.
